amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds appropriated by this Act from being made available to support the implementation or negotiations toward an extension of the Scientific and Technological Cooperation Protocol Between the United States of America and China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
